database-migration
******************


Description
===========

Use the Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Database Migration CLI to perform
database migration operations.


Available Commands
==================

* advisor-report-check

  * update

* advisor-report-check-collection

  * update-advisor-report-check-objects

  * update-advisor-report-check-objects-all-update-advisor-report-
    check-objects-details

  * update-advisor-report-check-objects-list-update-advisor-report-
    check-objects-details

  * update-check-action-update-object

  * update-check-action-update-object-all-update-check-action-update-
    object-details

  * update-check-action-update-object-list-update-check-action-update-
    object-details

* assessment

  * add

  * add-assessment-objects-my-sql-assessment-object-collection

  * add-assessment-objects-oracle-assessment-object-collection

  * change-compartment

  * clone

  * clone-assessment-my-sql-clone-assessment-details

  * clone-assessment-oracle-clone-assessment-details

  * create

  * create-assessment-create-my-sql-assessment-details

  * create-assessment-create-oracle-assessment-details

  * delete

  * get

  * perform-assessor-action

  * perform-assessor-action-download-sql

  * perform-assessor-check-action

  * remove

  * remove-assessment-objects-my-sql-assessment-object-collection

  * remove-assessment-objects-oracle-assessment-object-collection

  * update

  * update-assessment-update-my-sql-assessment-details

  * update-assessment-update-oracle-assessment-details

* assessment-object-collection

  * list-assessment-objects

* assessment-object-type-summary

  * list-assessment-object-types

* assessment-summary

  * list-assessments

* assessor

  * get

* assessor-check

  * get

  * list-affected-objects

* assessor-check-summary

  * list-assessor-checks

* assessor-summary

  * list-assessors

* binary

  * get-script

* connection

  * change-compartment

  * connection-diagnostics

  * create-mysql-connection

  * create-oracle-connection

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update-mysql-connection

  * update-oracle-connection

* database-connection-type-summary

  * list-database-connection-type

* excluded-object-summary

  * list

* job

  * abort

  * collect-traces

  * create-parameter-file-version

  * delete

  * delete-parameter-file-version

  * get

  * get-advisor-report

  * get-job-output-content

  * get-parameter-file-version

  * list

  * list-advisor-report-check-objects

  * list-advisor-report-checks

  * list-parameter-file-versions

  * make-current-parameter-file-version

  * resume

  * suspend

  * update

* job-output

  * list

* migration

  * add-mysql-objects

  * add-oracle-objects

  * change-compartment

  * clone-mysql-migration

  * clone-oracle-migration

  * create-mysql-migration

  * create-oracle-migration

  * delete

  * evaluate

  * get

  * list

  * remove-mysql-objects

  * remove-oracle-objects

  * retrieve-supported-phases

  * start

  * update-mysql-migration

  * update-oracle-migration

* migration-object-type-summary

* migration-objects

  * list

* migration-parameter-summary

  * list-migration-parameters

* work-request

  * get

  * list

* work-request-error

  * list

* work-request-logs

  * list
